Posts.Content: Thanks for the information. IM not always a patient person.
Posts.Title: why would you redo a mammogram in 3 to six months

Posts.Content: Hi smile, I just had a appoitnment with a new doctor. She gave me exam and found nothing, but did order a Ultra Sound just to be safe, she says it could of very well been a cyst. I will keep you updated, thank you for your help.
Posts.Title: why would you redo a mammogram in 3 to six months

Posts.Content: I just returned from the appointment with that same result. Is it normal to do this and not proceed with a ultrasound? Now I have to wait for six months to see if anyhting has changed? IM a big worrier, so this is not sitting to well.
